attributes.action: Spend a month living like the normal people of UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the PM live like a middle class person for a whole month and pay the SAME TAX that we HAVE to pay, strip him of benefits and see how we, the hard working members of the public have to cope when government strip us of our monthly wage.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
